Experiences & Education

  • Technical Lead - Pharmeasy (opens new window) (India's leading healthcare e-commerce platform)
    [October 2020 - Present]

    • Leading a tech team of 3 members responsible for the development of back-end services in the diagnostics vertical - Order management, Lab Management and Search service.
    • Designed and developed system integration with multiple third party labs; Business impact of 6x increase in order rate.
    • Enhanced the user experience by improving prescription upload flow; Reduced number of clicks by 60%.
    • Responsible for defining and execution of the non-business tech road-map.

  • Principal Software Engineer - Docon (opens new window) - Pharmeasy (opens new window) (An EMR platform)
    [October 2019 - September 2020]

    • Designed and coded - (i) Payments and invoicing part of the Doctor online consultation platform, (ii) Platform level storage service, (iii) Doctor analytics platform - A platform which includes operational and patient analytics for Doctors.

  • Senior Software Engineer - Myntra (opens new window) (India's largest fashion e-commerce platform)
    [September 2017 - October 2019]

    • Fashion Trends System - Developed an application to identify current global fashion trends; Business impact - Made Myntra catalog more fashionable and more profitable through (i) Product Ranking, (ii) Pricing and Discounting, (iii) Search Recommendations, (iv) Design Inspirations, (v) Trend store for Myntra Mobile Application

  • Software Engineer - Myntra (opens new window)
    [July 2015 - September 2017]

    • Myntra-Jabong Integration
      • Led integration of Myntra Seller system applications with Jabong platform.
      • Worked with the core team making Myntra applications multi-tenant.
    • Myntra Platform
      • Revamped Myntra Vendor Management System (ExtJS to ReactJS).
      • Developed front-end and back-end for Vendor Stock Movement tool. (Vendor Portal adoption was increased by 21%)
      • Redesign and Redevelopment of Vendor Discount Management System tool(back-end).
      • One of the three developers of Manufacturing Tracking Application.
      • Developed Seller Reporting feature of Seller Payment System (Integration with Citrus).
      • One of the two developers of Inbound Logistics Android App.

  • Software Engineer Internship - Myntra (opens new window)
    [January 2015 - July 2015]

    Developed back-end for Seller Scorecard based on important factors like delivery time, revenue, order count, quality, amongst others.
